Functions
GetUserTextInput
string Function GetUserTextInput()

Open text input for user and return string

Returns

User input string

GetUserTextInput

Open list of options for user and return selected item from it

Parameters
aaList

List of options to choose from.

abPremade

The format in which the elements of the source list are generated. If True then entries should contain explicit value for IDs and callback: entries[i] = _entryName[i] + ";;" + _entryParent[i] + ";;" + _entryId[i] + ";;" + _entryCallback[i] + ";;" + (_entryChildren[i] as int)

Returns

Index of the selected item

GetUserListInputEx
Int Function GetUserListInputEx(
string[] aaList,
Bool abPremade = True,
Int aiListWidth = -1,
Int aiEntryHeight = -1
)

Open list of options for user with extra parameters and text formatting and return selected item from it

Parameters
aaList
string[]

List of options to choose from.

abPremade
Bool

The format in which the elements of the source list are generated. If True then entries should contain explicit value for IDs and callback: entries[i] = _entryName[i] + ";;" + _entryParent[i] + ";;" + _entryId[i] + ";;" + _entryCallback[i] + ";;" + (_entryChildren[i] as int)

aiListWidth
Int

Desired width of the list (1280 is screen width). Default value: ~256

aiEntryHeight
Int

Desired height of the item in the list. Default value: 25

Returns

Index of the selected item
